I've been wearing various shirts from coofandy for a couple of years now and although some are a little outside of my taste, most of their clothing is right up my alley! I love the soft feel of this dress shirt, the semi-non-wrinkle fabric is great for a dress shirt (yes you can get some wrinkles in it, but it is not easy), the color is bold and sharp and I've gotten several compliments on it when I wear it to work, even 2 weeks in a row, I got compliments from some of the same people!  good job with this one Coofandy!
This was right out of the packaging. They are lightweight and are a very nice material. My husband really likes them!

Fit good and good material

评论概述: Will need to be ironed at least once
评论详情: I’m not sure about the statement that these shirts are wrinkle free. I have washed them and they have come out of the dryer fresh and still have the wrinkles from the prep packaging process. So I will need to iron these shirts at least once. Very annoying as they are stated to be wrinkle free. We’ll see whether or not they last and if they need to be ironed after each washing.

评论概述: Definitely not completely "wrinkle free" as advertised.
评论详情: Nice, dark charcoal looking color that will look great with dress pants. The material is smooth and almost has a sheen to it, which looks nice. Even after washing and drying for about 10 minutes, it was still pretty wrinkly (though there was some improvement), so this is not a truly wrinkle resistant shirt and will need an iron or steaming to be wrinkle free. Overall, quality looks and feels nice.
court

评论概述: Another Coofandy shirt to my collection
评论详情: I have many coofandy shirts and this has been recently added to my collection. It is a nice shirt that you can wear in a church situation with khakis and the shirt tucked in and also you could wear it untucked with jeans. It required steaming from the initial packaging but looks very nice now after a wash and steaming. There are no wrinkles after getting the inital packaging wrinkles out. It is stretchy and very comfortable to the skin. I am 6ft, 180lbs and normally wear a medium in a polyester type shirt. The large fits me well and I think the medium would be too small for me. I do like the chest pocket as it looks different from the other button up shirts that I have without any type of pocket. I will get other coofandy shirt in the future.
this shirt is nice and fitting. the material is soft and comfortable and it looks good on as well

This men's long-sleeve button-down shirt in a nice dusty blue color is a standout piece. The fit is excellent, offering a comfortable and tailored look, while the fabric feels soft and pleasant against the skin. It looks great whether dressed up or down, making it a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Overall, it’s a stylish and well-made shirt that combines both comfort and class.

This dress shirt runs true to size and is very comfortable. The material is soft and is easy to iron to get wrinkles out. It seems like it’s well made for a $25 shirt so I’m hoping it lasts a long time. So far, I’m very happy with this shirt.

Size up for a loose fit. Its a little tight on arms. The fabric is a great quality. Theres no much elasticity. It looks very nice and are comfortable. It might shrink if dried in hot temperatures. Good value for your money. I recommend. The fabric is wrinkly

This looks great on my teenage son. Coofandy pays attention to detail and materials, and offers them at a far lower price than you'd find in local stores. At least here in Alaska! This is another fine piece for my son's wardrobe.  Recommended.

Great shirt. Love the color, and the fit is very nice. (I am 5'7" and 200lbs currently). My only complaint is slight 'rippling' along the button area. It's not a deal-breaker in regards to my liking of it, but I can't give it a solid 5 stars. Still, looks decent and fits great - will see if the ripples fade out in time.

评论概述: This is a nice casual, dressy shirt but I wouldn't wear with a tie due to the collars.
评论详情: COOFANDY Men’s Dress Shirts Wrinkle Free Long Sleeve Button Down Shirt Formal Business Shirts  The material is soft due to the high count of polyester, and it looks good as a casual shirt.  This isn’t my first choice for a business shirt that I would wear a tie with because the collars are soft and don’t have collars stays, therefore you won’t have that nice crisp hard collar look with a tie.  For size reference: I’m 5’7 and 180lbs. I ordered a medium and it fit as expected.  I removed a star because this is advertised as a Formal Business shirt, it doesn’t have collar stays and no way to keep the collars straight as seen in a formal business look.  Overall, this is a nice casual, dressy shirt.

I recently ordered the 2X lavender shirt for my husband who typically wears a 2X. This brand, Coofandy, usually runs small. He has several of their shirts and I typically get a size up. The shoulder measurement is what I used this go. His shoulder is at 21 inches, so I didn't want him to have the droopy shoulders if I went up. I am glad I ordered this way. The shirt fit him perfectly. He said he wished it was a little longer because even at 5ft 7 inches, moving his arms caused the shirt to rise almost to his naval. He also said that the buttons felt smaller than normal. The material is lightweight and soft. The color is accurately depicted in the photos. This is a regular cut shirt.

评论概述: Really Nice Shirt that Fits Well
评论详情: This is a really nice shirt and it fits well. The size is true to size. I appreciate that the collar is nice and stiff, so it retains its shape. The fabric is nice and soft. I appreciate that the shirt is wrinkle free so I don’t have to iron it, but when you first get it in the mail, you do have to iron it. Color is true to what’s advertised.

This is a very nice shirt. It runs a bit small. It's very well made and the fabric is nice and soft. The fabric is a bit shinier than I particularly like but over all is a good item. I would recommend you give this item a try.

Color: Light grey.  I feel and look stylishly smart in this trendy, all-season, classic dress shirt.  It is of decent quality and has a nice silky feel to it.  As the material is wrinkle-free, it is easy care.  This is a must have addition to my formal wardrobe for staying fashionably chic.

评论概述: Very Nice Casual or Dress Shirt
评论详情: This shirt is well tailored and fits me perfectly. I’m 5’9” and weigh 155, the medium size is perfect for me. The styling is contemporary and it works equally well with the open collar and with the top button closed with a tie. I especially like that it is low maintenance. I was able to toss it in the regular (whites) wash and then into the dryer. Hung it up when it came out of the dryer and it is truly wrinkle free! Does not need any touchup to look ready to wear the next day. It is well made with no loose threads and the button holes are all of easy to use size. Best of all, it is comfortable to wear, smooth on the skin and feels good even on hot evenings outdoors. At this price point it is a very good deal.
This shirt is really beautiful.  It looks great, and the fit is excellent.  It's well made, just a great addition to my wardrobe.

I really enjoy the fabric of this shirt. It is soft, breathable, and lightweight. Though I prefer cotton, this synthetic material feels like exercise clothing, which is comfortable.  The shirt comes tightly folded, so there are deep creases in it. I'm not sure if you can iron this material - will it melt?  The shirt itself fits nicely. It doesn't look as form fitting as the one modeled in the photo. But i'm sure if you ordered a size down it would.  I'm 5'10 180lbs and I ordered a medium. It fits nicely

I absolutely love this COOFANDY Wrinkle Free Long Sleeve Button Down Shirt. The XL fit perfectly. And the lavender is a very stylish color! It has a nice silky and comfortable feel to it. And I can button the top button so I can wear a tie at formal events. It's made very well and though it says it's wrinkle-free, you may have to touch it up with an iron after washing. Highly recommend!

This dress shirt fits as expected. I am 5’7 and 190lbs and I have the large size. The wrinkle free fabric looks nice and is comfortable on my skin. I have a few dress shirts from COOFANDY and I must say that make good dress shirts at a good price.

评论概述: nice silk feel fabric, runs small
评论详情: A good looking and good feeling shirt, but it is somewhat small at the suggested size.

Love the color, decent fit but wish it tapered a bit more at the waist & was just a touch longer for tucking in. The material is nice and kind of a silky soft but I don’t think it’s very breathable. I was on the fence about keeping it but I really like the color and decided to give it a shot.
We ordered this shirt for my husband who wears a size 17.5 and 18 34/35 dress shirts. This fits perfectly. The material is nice. It is wrinkled out of the package. I recommend this.
